name: Monarch
author: Sektor
notes: Got to Legend 3 easily with Mask then went on the grind of trying to KOG with this brick machine. Finally did it. Marl searching Offerings is busted. Matched 3 amazons and 2 Heroes to rank up. TTH and chaos hunter put in work. Definitely going to go for some of the support cards in the new box and hope konami throws us a bone in the trader. MONARCHS ARE COMING
